Upload invoice data to update revenue trends

🔧 Database Setup

⚠️ Setup Required

Before uploading files, you need to set up the required database tables. Click "Test Database" to check if they exist.

📊 Upload Invoice Data

🔍 Smart Auto-Detection Features

  • • Automatic column detection: Finds invoice dates and amounts automatically
  • • Flexible date formats: Supports DD/MM/YYYY, MM/DD/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, "January 15, 2025", etc.
  • • Intelligent grouping: Groups individual invoices by month and sums totals
  • • Multi-language headers: Recognizes date/amount columns in English, Spanish, and more
  • • Flexible layout: Columns can be in any order (A, B, C, etc.)

Upload your Excel file containing individual invoice records with dates and amounts

📖 Supported Excel Formats

✅ Date Column Examples:

• 2025-01-15
• 15/01/2025
• 01/15/2025
• January 15, 2025
• 15 January 2025
• 15-01-2025

✅ Amount Column Examples:

• 1250.50
• 850
• 12500.00
• £1,250.50 (remove currency)
• $850.00 (remove currency)

🎯 How It Works:

  1. 1. Upload Individual Invoices: Each row should contain one invoice with its date and amount
  2. 2. Automatic Detection: System finds date and amount columns using smart content analysis
  3. 3. Monthly Grouping: All invoices are automatically grouped by month (e.g., all January 2025 invoices summed together)
  4. 4. Dashboard Update: Monthly totals are used to create the revenue trend chart
  5. 5. Real-time Metrics: Total revenue and growth calculations update automatically

💡 Pro Tips:

  • • Include headers like "Date", "Invoice Date", "Amount", "Value" for best detection
  • • Remove currency symbols (£, $, €) from amount columns
  • • Ensure dates are in a consistent format within the same column
  • • Use separate columns for dates and amounts (don't combine in one cell)
  • • System handles mixed date formats and flexible column orders automatically
